publications: [{"title":"Rethinking Banking for Startups","subtitle":"Hub71 x Roland Berger","date":"June 24, 2020","description":"The whitepaper highlights the challenges faced by startups, banks and key regulatory agencies in providing the startups with the right foundations to operate starting with opening bank accounts and more generally accessing a suite of favorable banking services. The whitepaper reveals that today UAE startups need 63 days to open a local bank account. Hub71 in partnership with Mashreq Bank, First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB) and the broader Abu Dhabi network of regulators are on a journey to help solve banking issues for startups reducing the time to opening an account to 5 days."}]
projects: [{"title":"Supported the development and growth of a tech ecosystem in a leading city in the GCC by developing and implementing stakeholder engagement programs, facilitating and driving partnerships as well as developing startup incentive packages","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Present","description":"> Lead and managed the full project with a team of 2 consultants> Developed a 5-year strategy> Identified the market positioning of the ecosystem and developed a value proposition to attract key stakeholders into the tech ecosystem> Attracted corporates, universities, global hubs and other stakeholders into the ecosystem> Developed startup banking products jointly with leading banks, regulators and FinTechs to achieve more than 80% reduction of time to open startup bank accounts"},{"title":"On-boarded a leading media agency to install and operate advertising assets across public transport networks of a globally leading city (scope of contract worth more than USD 400 million)","start_date":"Mar 2019","end_date":"Oct 2019","description":"> Lead and managed the full project with a team of 2 consultants> Developed a minimum viable product to be installed across the network to ensure world class consistent media quality> Identified the best partnership model between the transport operator and the media agency> Developed a 10-year business plan to identify required costs and potential revenues> Developed all required tender documents and oversaw the tender process> Supported the transport operator in selecting and negotiating with the winning bidder"},{"title":"Enhanced the customer journey of public transport users in a globally leading city by introducing experiential advertising concepts and leveraging the private sector to finance such concepts (i.e. through sponsorships, partnerships, etc.)","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"> Lead and managed the full project with a team of 3 consultants> Mapped the public transport user journey and identified potential enhancement touch points> Developed a holistic business plan to identify required costs and potential revenues> Reached out to and met with more than 100 leading companies in the GCC to identify potential partnerships (was able to close deals worth more than USD 50 million)"},{"title":"Developed a masterplan for a ministry in GCC","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Jan 2019","description":"> Consolidated all ministry initiatives into a masterplan> Identified improvement potential per initiative> Oversaw implementation"},{"title":"Developed a high-level strategy for a leading manufacturer in the GCC to transform its factories to smart factories through implementing IOT","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Oct 2018","description":"> Identified IOT needs of the manufacturer> Identified potential tech providers"},{"title":"Setup of a National Information Center with focus on Industry 4.0 for a leading GCC country","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Sep 2018","description":"> Developed a full strategy for the center> Developed a commercialization model for the center> Identified key initiatives to enable Industry 4.0 through this center> Liaised with key Ministries and private companies to launch the center"},{"title":"Developed Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions for one of the largest 5 ports globally","start_date":"Apr 2018","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"> Identified key processes which could be automated with RPA> Developed business cases for each of the Robots to be developed> Supported in the implementation kickoff of the Robots across the identified processes"},{"title":"Lead the development of a Credit Card product for a leading bank in GCC","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"> Developed a value proposition for the Credit Card product based on the customer journey > Created a customer-centric strategy to identify product features> Conducted extensive user testing to verify the Credit Card's value proposition> Lead workshops with the client"},{"title":"Lead the development of the Artificial Intelligence behind a Chatbot for a leading bank in GCC","start_date":"Feb 2018","end_date":"Mar 2018","description":"> Developed an exhaustive list of use cases> Developed a generic logic which allows the Chatbot to answer 10,000+ undefined use cases> Closely aligned development of AI logic and business requirements with the IT developers> Lead workshops with the client and IT developers"},{"title":"Launch of an integrated mobility platform","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Feb 2018","description":"> Launched of a fully integrated mobility platform in the Middle East> Responsible for developing a full-fledged marketing strategy > Oversaw the execution of the launch campaign> Managed external marketing agencies> Optimized and updated marketing strategy in general and digital strategy in specific"},{"title":"Commercial due diligence for the HR industry in GCC and 5-year strategy development of a leading company in the industry","start_date":"Mar 2017","end_date":"May 2017","description":"> Conducted external market, internal capability and competitor landscape analysis> Supported in valuating the company> Identified short-term strategy> Developed a 5-year business plan"},{"title":"Development of a 5-year digital strategy for a leading mobile operator in the Middle East","start_date":"Dec 2016","end_date":"Feb 2017","description":"> Conducted external market, internal capability and competitor landscape analysis> Developed short-term \"2X strategy\"> Developed long-term \"10X AI strategy\"> Developed a 5-year business plan"},{"title":"Restructuring a leading construction company in GCC and implementing a full-fledged transformation program","start_date":"Mar 2016","end_date":"Nov 2016","description":"> Completed a full restructuring of a leading construction company with 22,000+ employees> Successfully implemented a full-fledged transformation program> Set a KPI scorecard strategy to monitor effectiveness of transformation program"},{"title":"Commercial Due Diligence for a leading mobile operator","start_date":"Jan 2016","end_date":"Feb 2016","description":"> Conducted a full commercial due diligence for a leading mobile operator in the Middle East> Conducted external market analysis and internal capability analysis> Supported in valuating the company"},{"title":"Development of a comprehensive industrial strategy for a GCC country ","start_date":"Sep 2015","end_date":"Dec 2015","description":"> Developed an industrial strategy for a leading GCC country> Assisted the country in attracting FDI and SMEs"}]
